post:
Hey guys, I'm here to introduce AsuraHosting; a new OpenVZ VPS provider! Everything you need to know is at AsuraHosting.com; if you need any help or have any questions, feel free to post here or send me a PM.

Now for the deals... [https://asurahosting.com](https://www.asurahosting.com)

Package 1 - OpenVZ VPS-256 (PROMO Code: **ASURA256**)
256MB Dedicated RAM
10GB Disk Space
250GB Bandwidth
100mbit Port Speed
1 CPU Core (2Ghz)*
1 IPv4 & 1 IPv6 dedicated addresses
Located in Kansas City, MO.
Priced at **$5/month** - [Order Now](https://asurahosting.com/cart/)

Package 2 - OpenVZ VPS-512 (PROMO Code: **ASURA512**)
512MB Dedicated RAM
20GB Disk Space

100mbit Port Speed

Priced at **$7/month** - [Order Now](https://asurahosting.com/cart/)

*Promotional codes will last until January 31st, 2012! We have very limited quantities, these are not oversold.
